website_summaries.verdict: The DirecTV HR20 is easy to use and offers plenty of features, but its operational bugs make use more of a headache than with other DVRs.
pros: Receives and records new MPEG-4 AVC programming, including local and other HD channels not available on older receivers
can record two HD shows simultaneously while playing back a third
can record two over-the-air HD programs simultaneously
excellently designed interface includes contextual menu
easy one-touch recording from EPG or live TV
great range of EPG sort criteria
can bookmark scenes within recordings for easy access
cons: Operational bugs include occasional dropped video and audio, crashes, and missed recordings
generally lighter selection of local HD sports channels than cable
no aspect-ratio control with HD sources
EPG still cannot be limited to only subscribed-to channels
cannot properly extend end time of scheduled recordings

customer_reviews.title: A repo
customer_reviews.text: After contacting DirecTV, to activate, I was told this was owned by someone named Jose in Tucson, AZ and I would need to purchase a new card to activate. Even after receiving new card it would not activate, so i was forced o purchase a new hd receiver from DirecTV.
customer_reviews.author: Dl Chavez

customer_reviews.title: wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned to seller. I searched Amazon for a DirecTV satellite HD reciever with DVR and was sent one without DVR. I'm out $13.00 for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Be aware - no OTA tuner
customer_reviews.text: The earlier model HR20 has an Over the Air tuner, but the HR21 does not. This may not seem important since you probably get your local channels from DirecTV. But it might be important if you are in one of the numerous cities DirecTV does not carry the local HD channels. To me, an HD DVR is pretty useless without the ability to record the big network shows in HD. Meanwhile, this unit does not have dual live buffering like TIVO models. of course, the DirecTivo units don't have the capability to pick up the new HD channels on DirecTV; so everything is a trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Neilll

customer_reviews.title: A learning curve after Tivo, but a rock-solid STB!
customer_reviews.text: DirecTV offered to replacy my HR10-250 (Tivo) box with a brandy-new HR21-200. This is essentially the same as their HR20 unit, except this one isn't equipped with an off-the-air (OTA) tuner. I can get all locals via DirecTV here just north of Boston, so I don't need OTA capability. There's a little bit of a learning curve with the GUI on this box, but, besides that, it's proven to be a rock-solid and dependable unit. I highly recommend this box - especially if you want to receive all of the HD channels DireTV is offering now (which you can't receive with the HR10-250).
customer_reviews.author: CorkyMuldoon

customer_reviews.title: The worst DVR I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst DVR I have ever used, due to this poor equipment and DirecTV's refusal to mitigate the issues with it, I will be leaving for another service once the contract has expired in a couple of months. It is slow, misses recordings, freezes, the issues go on. If this receiver wasn't leased I would have smashed it with a sledgehammer already.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: So even if you hate DIRECTV.. This is a nice Receiver..
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for about a year...Initially it had overheating problems which DIRECTV finally got resolved about 6 months ago. The best part of this is it works with upnp sharing tools like twonkymedia. This allows the receiver to play music, photos and VIDEOs from your media player or Windows MCE. It plays MPEG2 and vob files. Generally speaking VLC does a great job of converting and Twonkymedia for serving. I have been playing movies for months on my HR21 - a great mix of a product. If you want to read more about Directv you can read my full review at: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Max Bellum

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, I have had this DVR freeze up about once a week and am forced to power off/on the machine. The good news is that it has never "lost" a program that I recorded. Additionally I have problems with lips and voice synchronizing more frequently than I like. Also, the clock is always off about 8 to 15 seconds causing me to miss the first few seconds of a show. On the positive side, I do like the black finish and when it works (most of the time), it does work great. DIRECTV is suppose to be getting me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: If there was a Zero or 1/2 star option, I would have selected it. This unit is very unreliable. It freezes on a regular basis. It becomes unresponsive and gets stuck during regular speed playback, or while fast-forwarding, or rewinding. The only way to resolve it is to reset the unit which takes nearly 10 minutes and interrupts and programs being recorded. This is a shoddy attempt by Rupert Murdoch to make more money and force an inferior product on Directv customers. Bring back HD TIVO and stop forcing this garbage on customers.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: good step up over the HR-20
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an HR-20 with this. Definately a good move. Almost twice the capacity thanks to the monster 750gb hard drive. New look is great with the mirror black finish and subduded leds replacing the super bright distracting leds of the HR20. The over the air tuners of the HR-20 are gone which might be a problem for some but I get all my locals in HD over sat so it's fine by me. Good unit, great picture and sound, especially on the new mpeg4 channels. Cable can't touch directv for hd. 85 channels so far and 100 by month end. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: sjp777

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I might be the lucky one or it's just the very unlucky ones who are reviewing this unit. I get all my local channels without an OTA tuner and my unit has never locked up on me. It took me a while to decide, but once they dropped the price to $200 I pulled the trigger. I'm very happy I decided to purchase this unit and extremely happy I switched from the local cable company (time warner).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Eckhart

customer_reviews.title: It's only a lease and then you'll be locked into a two year contract.  When it rains your TV will go out.
customer_reviews.text: I tried Direct TV but no more. You think your buying the receiver but Direct TV will require you to send it back if you end their "service" after a two year contract. If it rains or snows your reception will go out with Direct TV. I was always scared to have a Super Bowl party at home because I might not have reception during the game. I won't go back.
customer_reviews.author: John Pearson

customer_reviews.title: You have no idea what you're getting yourself into...
customer_reviews.text: Unit no longer turns on after 5 DAYS. SWEET. They sent me a new one with parts missing from the box, and it's 0-1 when trying to record shows with the DVR function. I guess they want the broken one back, but forgot to send me the shipping labels, shipping instructions, installation instructions, you know... anything useful you'd need. This company is an absolute joke. if you don't believe me, do some research.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - TIHS WILL EXTEND AN EXISTING AGREEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I learned this the hard way so I wanted to let others know. If you already have DirecTV service and purchase new equipment, your service contract will be extended by 2 years on the date you activate the new equipment. Customer service is the worst I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM DIRECT TV
customer_reviews.text: DIRECT TV has the worst customer service. I ordered direct tv and was supposed to have someone installing the dish. the guy never showed up and reported that i didn't have the landlord form (which was signed and waiting for him; that the building was not accessible while we have 3 direct tv dish on the top of the building... I have complained to them but it was like talking to a wall... STAY AWAY!!! DON'T WAIST YOUR TIME OR $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Petit-homme

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE bring TIVO back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Freezes, then freezes, then voices are off ... I'm on my THIRD unit ... After a year I still have to keep the lights on in order to know what buttons I'm pressing on the remote, terrible design ... I had the TIVO remote memorized in a week ... If you cancel recording a show when both tuners are recording for some reason it stops recording but forgets to tell the brain it stopped so it still won't let you change channels ... RESET! ... Now my screen is stuck on step 1 of 2 and won't EVER change ... I hate you direct tv.
customer_reviews.author: DarioTexas

customer_reviews.title: This is the reason I switched to Dish Network!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this receiver working for 2 hours before it failed .... this is the reason I switched to Dish Network and amazing I haven't regretted it! Didn't realize how bad DirecTV's HD sucked in comparison to Dish Network and how much DirecTV was ripping me off per month!
customer_reviews.author: Weaver Cattle Company

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ACCEPT THIS RECEIVER FROM DIRECTV
customer_reviews.text: If DirecTV tries to send you this receiver, REFUSE IT. This is the slowest, worst piece of receiver technology a person can own. I would rather go to cable tv than use this receiver.
customer_reviews.author: J.Bowling

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT AN HR21. THIS IS NOT A DVR!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the product info on this page is for an HR21, which is a DVR, NOT an H21, which is not. the heading is right, but the tags and everything (even the comments) are not. it is extremely confusing and probably should be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan_Y

customer_reviews.title: Don't be a Directv victim. . . I mean customer.
customer_reviews.text: Directv has the worst customer service I have ever experienced. They lie to you and cheat you out of credits and discounts. None of their employees will tell you the same thing. They all have a different answer for the same question. And if you do decide to be their victim, I mean customer, don't ever refer anyone else. You'll either never get your $50 referral credit or they'll have your service shut off because the idiot on the other end of the phone gave you too many credits. Also, I agree with other reviews that frequently the sound and picture are not in sync.
customer_reviews.author: S. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A LEASED DIRECTV RECEIVER
customer_reviews.text: Although Amazon.com doesn't say it anywhere in its description, the HR21 DIRECTV® requires a 24 month commitment and all equipment must be returned to DIRECTV® if customer cancels service with DIRECTV®
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: price check
customer_reviews.text: this price isn't a saving everyone large electronics retailer is selling this item for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Srh

product_meta.title: DirecTV HR21-100 HD Satellite Receiver
product_meta.description: The DIRECTV HD DVR delivers you the ultimate in 100% digital-quality DIRECTV programming. Add the DIRECTV HD package and DVR service and you get the best choice and widest selection of high-definition programming and the convenience of digital video recording in one unit. Images are sharper. Colors are brighter. Sound is crisper. And now they can be recorded. The easy-to-use search function enables you to locate exactly what you want to watch or record. Take a look at all the features and benefits and get ready to enjoy maximum entertainment. DIRECTV HR21 HD DVR Satellite Receiver In Black - HR21700/ Standard-Definition And High Definition Enabled/ Record Up To 200 Hrs Of SD Or 50 Hours Of HD (MPEG-4) Programming/ 2 Satellite Tuners/ Advanced Program Guide/ 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i Picture Output And Multiple Screen Formats Supported
feature_bullets: DIRECTV requires a 24 month commitment and all equipment must be returned to DIRECTV if customer cancels service with DIRECTV
2 Satellite Tuners For Access To SD And HD DIRECTV
Pause And Rewind Live High-definition TV For Up To 90 Minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
